name: PL/M Source Code File
summary: A PLM file is a source code file written in PL/M (Programming Language for Microcomputers), a high-level programming language for Intel 8-bit microcomputers . It contains declarations and statements separated by semicolons that are compiled by a PL/M compiler into machine code that can be run by a microcomputer.
